items.name: LastMile
items.description: This side project is designed to provide users with an easy way to find affordable airfare. It features a visual chart segment that analyzes the top three airlines in terms of current traffic and passenger volume, offering users a comprehensive understanding of the aviation sector. Additionally, it employs Three.js technology to create an engaging questionnaire section, enhancing the interactive and enjoyable aspects of the user experience.

items.name: GPT Audio
items.description: This side project utilizes GPT Transition and Audio APIs to provide users with a key point extraction tool. This tool will be particularly valuable for users who need to extract essential information from extended recordings.
